channel.title: Assign a keyboard shortcut to switch action groups
channel.description:
Hi all this maybe trivial and I apologise in advance if it is, but can one assign a keyboard shortcut to switch action groups?
that is on the Mac press `⌘-x` to switch to the TAD writing group etc...
best
Z

item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
Copy this action, set the name of the action group in the template tag step, and give it the icon name and keyboard shortcut you want.

actions.getdrafts.com

Load action group exanple | Drafts Action Directory

Don’t forget that workspaces have a setting to set the default action group too.
